name: GPicView
description: GPicView is a small, simple and fast image viewer. It's characterized with navigation, zoom, rotation, saving and deletion of image viewing and other functions.

en_US.description: GPicView is a small, simple and fast image viewer. It's characterized with navigation, zoom, rotation, saving and deletion of image viewing and other functions.
en_US.name: GPicView

zh_CN.description: GPicView是一款小巧、简单、快速的图像查看器，它包含图像查看的导航 、缩放 、旋转 、保存以及删除等功能。
zh_CN.name: GPicView
